page.title: 09INDUSTRY_OLD AND NEW
page.content:
Unemployment in Port Glasgow has increased in the last few years due to the decline in the shipbuilding {industry.}Despite of this the majority of the male{population}in Port Glasgow are employed in the shipyards.The industrial estate employs a number of people but a large number of their employees come from outside Port Glasgow.A number of people work outside Port Glasgow in the {electronics}industry in Greenock and the munitions factory in Bishopton.For
school leavers the future is very bleak and the majority of 16_18 year olds are unemployed,although the government has set up a college programme for this age group which alongside the YTS is helping to keep the unemployment figures from rocketing.
